text: The 1920 New York Giants season was the franchise's 38th season. The team finished in second place in the National League with an 86-68 record, 7 games behind the Brooklyn Robins. == Offseason == * February 1920: Fred Lear was purchased by the Giants from the Chicago Cubs.Fred Lear page at Baseball Reference == Regular season == === Season standings === === Record vs. opponents === === Roster === {| class="toccolours" style="font-size: 95%;" |- !
